attributes.action: To replace gas and electric with a more renewable source to save money.
attributes.additional_details:
It was crowned the cheapest source of energy in 2021, followed by onshore and offshore wind becoming more affordable then gas. 
This would also make Britain more environmentally secure for future generations as well as well as helping environmental sustainability  become a "key" factor in the development of future free trade agreements (FTAs), after widespread criticism from green groups over the recent FTA with Australia.
This would also mean that the cost of living crisis would go down.
attributes.background:
To start using more renewable sources of energy like solar and wind.So people could afford to heat there homes over the winter and the months/ years that follow.
There should be more social schemes to help people who are struggling with the upcoming months ahead.
There has been and energy surge
